meanings.definition: A sentence that is part of a larger sentence.
meanings.sent1: In the story, the subsubsentences helped to explain the main idea.
meanings.sent2: She struggled to understand the subsubsentences within the paragraph.
meanings.sent3: The subsubsentences were like puzzle pieces that fit perfectly together.
meanings.sent4: Her thoughts were like subsubsentences, waiting to be connected into a complete idea.
meanings.sent5: The teacher used colorful markers to highlight the subsubsentences in the text.

meanings.definition: Sentences that are subordinate to the main sentence.
meanings.sent1: The subsubsentences provided additional information to the main idea.
meanings.sent2: He easily identified the subsubsentences in the complex paragraph.
meanings.sent3: The subsubsentences whispered secrets that only the reader could understand.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was a library full of subsubsentences waiting to be explored.
meanings.sent5: The subsubsentences danced around the main sentence, adding depth to the story.
